title: Doorstep vanilla cheesecake with rum punch roasted pears, figs and toasted hazelnuts
description: This no-bake cheescake is easy as pie to make. Lorraine serves hers with vanilla and rum roasted pears, but you can use whatever is in season. For this recipe you will need a deep 23cm/9in springform cake tin.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeds removed
4 ripe pears, cored and cut into quarters lengthways
250ml/9fl oz dark rum or apple juice
1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways
